name: Serenity
pages: The $(l)Serenity$() is a compact, fully automatic $(o)LightFrag$() personal defense weapon. With a fire rate of 1200 rounds/min, it can shred enemies to bits in less than a second. However its max range is 12 m, and it can struggle against tougher enemies.

pages.text: This upgrade module comes pre-installed in the Serenity. Custom-designed for its LightFrags, it won't anger neutral mobs or knock them back. Additionally, firing won't trigger sculk sensors.
